p.span: Each student voted for his or her favorite color.
The result of the class vote is shown

choiceInteraction.prompt: Indicate which of the following statements are accurate.

simpleChoice.p: The majority of students voted for Red.
Twice as many students voted for Red a voted for Blue.
Two percent of students voted for Yellow.
Red received more votes thatn any other color.
Twenty-five percent of students voted for Green.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Ms. Smith's class contains twenty four students.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Miz Smiths class contains twenty-four students.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Each student voted for his or her favorite color.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Each student voted for his or her favorite color.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: Each student voted for his or her favorite color.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: The result of the class vote is shown
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: The result of the class vote is shown

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: The result of the class vote is shown

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: in the table below.
Results of the Class Vote
Color
Number of Students
Red
Twelve
Blue
six
Green
four
Yellow
two
Indicate which of the following statements are accurate.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Indicate which of the following state-mints are accurate.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: Indicate which of the following statements are accurate.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Option one: The majority of students voted for Red.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Option one: The majority of students voted for Red.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: option 1: The majority of students voted for Red.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Option two: Twice as many students voted for Red as voted for Blue.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: option 2: Twice as many students voted for Red as voted for Blue.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Option three: Two percent of students voted for Yellow.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: option 3: 2% of students voted for Yellow.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Option four: Red received more votes than any other color.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Option four: Red received more votes than any other color.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: option 4: Red received more votes than any other color.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Option five: Twenty-five percent of students voted for Green.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Option five: Twenty-five percent of students voted for Green.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: option 5: 25% of students voted for Green.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Shown is a table with the title, "Results of the Class Vote." The table has two columns with four rows of data.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Shown is a table with the title, "Results of the Class Vote." The table has two columns with four rows of data.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: Shown is a table with the title: Results of the Class Vote. The table has 2 columns with 4 rows of data.

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Column one heading is Color.
Column two heading is Number of Students.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Column two heading is Number of Students.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: column 2 heading is Number of Students

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Row one: the color is red. The number of students is twelve.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Row one: the color is red. The number of students is twelve.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: Row 1: the color is red. The number of students is 12

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Row two: the color is blue. The number of students is six.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Row two: the color is blue. The number of students is six.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: Row 2: the color is blue. The number of students is 6

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Row three: the color is green. The number of students is four.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Row three: the color is green. The number of students is four.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: Row 3: the color is green. The number of students is 4

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Row four: the color is yellow. The number of students is two.
apip:spoken.apip:textToSpeechPronunciation: Row four: the color is yellow. The number of students is two.

apip:brailleText.apip:brailleTextString: Row 4: the color is yellow. The number of students is 2

apip:spoken.apip:spokenText: Accurate means correct.
